extendedInfo.description: Best matching game for kids of all ages! Download Kids Memory Game â Balloons and keep your children entertained for hours! Not only that your kids will enjoy playing this game, but it also helps the brain development process!â	Flip the cards and match the same pictures!â	From easy to hard difficulty levels: choose from 3x2, 4x3, 6x4, 7x4 and 8x4 tables!â	Single player and multiplayer mode!â	Pictures of air balloons will keep the kids entertained and interested!â	Perfect brain game for both children and adults!Memory is a skill we all use everyday and the stronger it is the better. There's nothing worse than drawing a blank on a name when you see a face you recognize, except possibly forgetting a speech you've prepared for a big presentation for your boss. Don't let that happen, start improving your memory today with fun memory games for kids.Kids love playing puzzle games. Logic games make it easy for kids to improve their short-term memory and speed recognition skills. Kids love practicing their memory skills while playing fun online games like the traditional card flipping memory match game. Elementary schools and middle schools are incorporating âmath gamesâ into their regular curricula as playing them and watching videos online provides the results teachers want for their students. And best of all, kids have fun while learning!All of us are born with a memory but we do have to practice using it well in order to keep it working efficiently. Our memories work in a couple of different ways. For example, your mom or dad asks you to remember a phone number for them while they get a pen to write it down, you use your short term memory. It means that you will most likely remember the phone number for just a few minutes. Long term memory is used to remember information even years later. For example, people might remember their first day of school, or a particularly exciting birthday party, or their favorite childhood toy. There are many cool games that kids can play to improve and test their memory skills.Solving puzzles and crosswords also helps keeping the brain fresh and young! That is why this mind game can be played by adults and elders to help them increase memory! Get this great puzzler and exercise your brain every day! Brain teasers are great too, but Kids âMemory Gameâ â Balloons is a better way to improve thinking because you get to match the same colored balloons and it's more fun and easier for younger kids!Watching red balloons, blue balloons and all other colors, children will also learn to distinguish colors and practice memory while having fun at the same time! There are more girls games on the market, but this is one of the best boy games currently available! Download this amazing 2013 free app and get the perfect pastime for your child!
